definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

sentences.english: Thenceforth, M. Madeleine was transfigured in Fantine's eyes.
sentences.chinese: 从此马德兰先生在芳汀的心目中是另外一个人了。

sentences.english: It has since stopped using the pallets.
sentences.chinese: 从此以后就不再使用木托板。

sentences.english: Henceforth it will be more difficult to avoid customs examination.
sentences.chinese: 从此以后，避免海关检查将会更加困难。

sentences.english: From then on, the sheep of this shepherd hadn't been thieved by the wolf any more.
sentences.chinese: 从此，那个牧民的羊就再也没有被家狼叼走过了。

sentences.english: Starting from the map, the business processes of interest are then further detailed.
sentences.chinese: 从此图开始，将对所关心的业务流程进一步细化。

sentences.english: Neither the captain, the first mate, nor the second mate ever worked again.
sentences.chinese: 船长，大副和二副从此以后再也不一起工作了。

sentences.english: He was wronged as a Rightist in 1957, thus keeping silent for over 21 years.
sentences.chinese: 1957年被错划右派，从此沉寂长达二十一年。

sentences.english: China will hence be a nation of lazybones !
sentences.chinese: 然而中国从此成为一个懒人国了。

sentences.english: You can download free electronic copies of all of his books at this site.
sentences.chinese: 您可以从此站点免费下载他所有书籍的电子版。

sentences.english: From now on days of A letter is whole excessive drinking, abandonment.
sentences.chinese: 从此阿信整日酗酒，自暴自弃。

sentences.english: Then Israel came to Egypt, Jacob settled in the land of Ham.
sentences.chinese: 从此以色列进入了埃及，雅各伯也就在含邦作客。

sentences.english: But lo, China will hence be a nation of lazybones.
sentences.chinese: 然而中国从此就成了一个懒人国了。

sentences.english: From now on all the and beauty, vientiane update.
sentences.chinese: 从此人间一切和美，万象更新。

sentences.english: This was the holy ikon that had been brought away from Smolensk, and had accompanied the army ever since.
sentences.chinese: 这是从斯摩棱斯克运出并且从此就跟着军队的圣像。

sentences.english: It has changed the way I try and live.
sentences.chinese: 这席话从此改变了我的生活。

sentences.english: Hence, the custom of hanging lanterns during the lantern Festival came into being.
sentences.chinese: 据说从此以后，就有了元宵挂灯的风俗。

definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
once it gets started there's no stopping it
pinyin: yi1 fa1 bu4 ke3 shou1 shi5

definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
to be impossible to stop once started
pinyin: yi1 fa1 er2 bu4 ke3 shou1

definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
